Gameshark Technology
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Game Shark Codes & Dex Drive Saves: Gameshark Technology
By Prototype A-13 on Thursday, November 23, 2000 - 10:30 am:

I have a gameshark version 2.0. In the back i see what might be a connection piece thingy to a computer. What the heck could i use it for? A printer connection? Do any other versions have this?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 23, 2000 - 10:51 am:

It's to connect it to your computer, so you can use it to hack your own codes. You'll need a standard cable, plus some software. The software used to be downloadable from the gameshark.com site, but 2.0 is pretty old now so I'm not certain about support. There have been upgrades available for a bit. Try looking around their site and boards
